Package org.educraft.block.calculator

Provides the classes necessary to create and use the calculator block.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockCalculator
    This class implements a block that can be used to perform calculations.
    CalculatorContainer
    This class is used to keep track of a particular BlockCalculator's inventory.
    CalculatorGui
    This class handles the creation and display of the BlockCalculator GUI.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CalculatorCraftingManager
    This class is essentially identical to CraftingManager, but because that class implements the singleton pattern, it cannot be extended.

Package org.educraft.block.calculator Description

Provides the classes necessary to create and use the calculator block.
